properties.entry: SELECT LOCATION, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_TITLE, PRICE, ROUND(AVG(STAR),1) STAR, FILE_PATH, CHANGE_NAME, ROOM_NO FROM ROOMS R LEFT OUTER JOIN FILES F USING(ROOM_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN ROOMS_REVIEW USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 0 AND R.STATUS = 'Y' AND ENROLL_STATUS = '등록완료' GROUP BY LOCATION, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_TITLE, PRICE, FILE_PATH, CHANGE_NAME, ROOM_NO ORDER BY ROOM_NO DESC

SELECT ROOM_NAME , ROOM_DES , MIN_PEOPLE , MAX_PEOPLE , MIN_STAY , MAX_STAY , PRICE , EXTRA_COST , START_TIME , END_TIME , ROOM_TYPE , BUILDING_TYPE , ROOM_SIZE , ROOM , BED , BATH , ROOM_FAC , ROOM_LINK
, CHANGE_NAME , ROOM_NO , FILE_PATH , FILE_NO FROM ROOMS R JOIN FILES F USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND F.STATUS = 'Y' AND ROOM_NO = ?

SELECT ROOM_RESERVE , START_DATE , END_DATE , PERSON_RESERVE , RESERVE_NUM , RESERVE_STATE , ROOM_NO , ROOM_NAME , ADDRESS , START_TIME , END_TIME , FILE_PATH , CHANGE_NAME FROM RESERVATION JOIN ROOMS USING(ROOM_NO) JOIN FILES USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE GUEST = ? AND RESERVE_STATE != '예약취소' AND FILE_LEVEL = 0
UPDATE RESERVATION SET RESERVE_STATE = '예약취소' WHERE ROOM_RESERVE = ?
UPDATE RESERVATION SET RESERVE_STATE = '숙박완료' WHERE ROOM_RESERVE = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ROOMS_REVIEW WHERE ROOM_NO = ? AND REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT STAR , REVIEW , REVIEW_DATE , USER_NAME FROM ROOMS_REVIEW JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_ID) WHERE ROOM_NO = ? AND REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

INSERT INTO RESERVATION ( ROOM_RESERVE ,START_DATE ,END_DATE ,PERSON_RESERVE ,PONE ,RESERVE_STATE ,RESERVE_NUM ,GUEST ,ROOM_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ROOMRESERVE.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , '예약신청' , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT ROOM_RESERVE , START_DATE , END_DATE , PERSON_RESERVE , PONE , RESERVE_STATE , RESERVE_NUM , ROOM_NO , ROOM_NAME , USER_ID FROM RESERVATION JOIN ROOMS USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ?

SELECT ROOM_RESERVE , START_DATE , END_DATE , PERSON_RESERVE , PONE , RESERVE_STATE , RESERVE_NUM , ROOM_NO , ROOM_NAME , USER_ID FROM RESERVATION JOIN ROOMS USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND GUEST LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT ROOM_RESERVE , START_DATE , END_DATE , PERSON_RESERVE , PONE , RESERVE_STATE , RESERVE_NUM , ROOM_NO , ROOM_NAME , USER_ID FROM RESERVATION JOIN ROOMS USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND ROOM_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT ROOM_RESERVE , START_DATE , END_DATE , PERSON_RESERVE , PONE , RESERVE_STATE , RESERVE_NUM , ROOM_NO , ROOM_NAME , USER_ID FROM RESERVATION JOIN ROOMS USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND ROOM_RESERVE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
UPDATE RESERVATION SET RESERVE_STATE = '결제대기' WHERE ROOM_RESERVE = ?
UPDATE RESERVATION SET RESERVE_STATE = '리뷰완료' WHERE ROOM_RESERVE = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION JOIN ROOMS USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE RESERVE_STATE = '예약신청' AND USER_ID = ?

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION JOIN ROOMS USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE RESERVE_STATE = '예약완료' AND USER_ID = ?

SELECT START_DATE , END_DATE FROM RESERVATION WHERE RESERVE_STATE != '예약취소' AND ROOM_NO = ?
